metadata.title: Global Fitwell
metadata.description: The future of wellness. Technology and science for your potential.

storePage.title: Our Wellness Store
storePage.subtitle: A curated selection of products to boost your health and performance.

aboutPage.title: About Us
aboutPage.subtitle: Our mission is to enhance global wellness through science and innovation.

content.text: Global Fitwell was born from the belief that everyone deserves access to wellness solutions that are safe, effective, and based on scientific evidence. Our team consists of nutrition experts, scientists, and fitness enthusiasts dedicated to researching and developing products that make a real difference in people's lives.

We are committed to transparency, quality, and sustainability in everything we do. From sourcing the purest ingredients to conducting rigorous third-party lab testing, our priority is your trust and your results.

privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.subtitle: Your trust and data protection are our highest priority.

content.text: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as your name and email when you subscribe to our newsletter. We also collect technical data automatically, such as your IP address and browser type.

We use your information to process orders, personalize your experience, and communicate with you about our products and offers. We will never share your personal data with unaffiliated third parties without your explicit consent.

termsPage.title: Terms of Service
termsPage.subtitle: By using our website, you agree to the following terms and conditions.

content.text: This website and its content are for your personal, non-commercial use. You may not modify, copy, distribute, or sell any information obtained from this site.
All content, including text, graphics, logos, and images, is the property of Global Fitwell and is protected by copyright laws.

campaignSuitePage.title: Campaign Design Suite
campaignSuitePage.subtitle: A guided wizard to create, configure, and generate validated campaign assets.

step1.title: Step 1: Page Structure
step1.logoUploadText: Drag & drop your logo here, or click to select

step2.title: Step 2: Layout Composition
step2.layoutBuilderDescription: Drag and drop sections to define the narrative flow of your page.

step3.title: Step 3: Visual Theme
step3.themeSelectorDescription: Combine fragments to create a unique visual identity that reinforces your marketing angle.

step4.title: Step 4: Content Editing
step4.contentEditorDescription: Click on each section to add the text in all supported languages.

step5.title: Step 5: Management & Publishing
step5.description: Review your campaign draft and choose the final action. From here you can publish, export, or delete your work.
